title: Lumber Rebound Awakens Timber Market From Long Slumber
sub_head: Wet weather, cardboard-box boom add to higher prices for southern pine, which have been depressed since the housing bust
body:
Record lumber prices and cardboard production are starting to lift southern timber prices from their yearslong slump.
Wet weather has helped, too. A lot of woodlands are too mushy to log, putting a premium on trees that can be harvested from dry ground.
